example.name: instransitive
example.text: [*-16] Aiming at the development requirements of the Gansu tourism industry , People 's Insurance Co. actively promotes travel insurance for overseas tourists , and took the lead [*ICH*-17] at home in [*] providing insurance for individual overseas tourists , which [*T*-18] made [*] sure that all those who [*T*-19] came sightseeing in Gansu Province during the " eighth five - year plan " period had insurance .
example.arg: during the " eighth five - year plan " period
